mapper.select:
SELECT FLIGHT_PRICE_HISTORY_NO, FLIGHT_OFFER_PRICE_TOTAL, FLIGHT_OFFER_CURRENCY, FLIGHT_OFFER_ONE_WAY, FLIGHT_OFFER_DEPART_DATE, FLIGHT_OFFER_RETURN_DATE, FLIGHT_OFFER_API_QUERY_DATE, AIRLINE_ID FROM TB_FLIGHT_PRICE_HISTORY WHERE DEPART_IATA_CODE = #{depart} AND ARRIVE_IATA_CODE = #{arrive} AND FLIGHT_OFFER_DEPART_DATE = TO_DATE(#{departDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND FLIGHT_OFFER_RETURN_DATE = TO_DATE(#{returnDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND FLIGHT_OFFER_ONE_WAY = 'Y'
AND FLIGHT_OFFER_ONE_WAY = 'N'
AND FLIGHT_OFFER_API_QUERY_DATE >= SYSDATE - (1 / 24)
ORDER BY FLIGHT_OFFER_API_QUERY_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FLIGHT_PRICE_HISTORY ( FLIGHT_PRICE_HISTORY_NO, FLIGHT_OFFER_PRICE_TOTAL, FLIGHT_OFFER_CURRENCY, FLIGHT_OFFER_ONE_WAY, FLIGHT_OFFER_DEPART_DATE, FLIGHT_OFFER_RETURN_DATE, FLIGHT_OFFER_API_QUERY_DATE, AIRLINE_ID, DEPART_IATA_CODE, ARRIVE_IATA_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_FLIGHT_PRICE_HISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{flightOfferPriceTotal}, #{flightOfferCurrency}, #{flightOfferOneWay}, #{flightOfferDepartDate}, #{flightOfferReturnDate}, SYSDATE, #{airlineId}, #{departIataCode}, #{arriveIataCode} )
